title: Is We Dumb? | Umbrella. Banana Bread. CO2. Sad Robber.
description:
Imagine if you just stole a dog from a parked car... and THEN thought it would be a good idea to walk that same dog a couple days later back through the exact parking lot you stole it from in the first place?! It happened. Let's talk about that, shoving banana bread in a gunshot wound, signing your friends up for cool facts about cats, a robber who can't get anyone's attention, and more on today's episode of Is We Dumb?!

 

New episodes every Wednesday at 12pm PST

 

Watch this episode on YouTube: https://youtu.be/ca8oB3tMv4k
